31.eng-name: The Book of Manumission of Slaves

hadiths.text: Imran b. Husain said:A man emancipated six slaved at the time of his death and he had no other property. The Prophet (ﷺ) was informed about it. He cast lots among them, emancipated two and retained four in slavery

chapter.ara-name: باب فِيمَنْ أَعْتَقَ عَبِيدًا لَهُ لَمْ يَبْلُغْهُمُ الثُّلُثُ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding One Who Manumits Slaves Of His That Exceed One Third Of His Property
